messages.info: Enter the email address you used to register or your username.
messages.success: Check your email for details on how to reset your password. For security reasons, this hint is visible even if the account doesn't exist. Recheck your input if you don't receive an email.

external.explanation: Your account credentials are not stored in Artemis but {{provider}}.
external.noLink: The password reset links for {{provider}} are not provided. Please notify the administrator. If you know how to reset your password for {{provider}} you can do it yourself.
external.hint: Please reset your password using this link:
external.generalHint: If you use your credentials from {{provider}} instead of Artemis, please reset your password here:

messages.error: Your password couldn't be reset. As a reminder, password reset requests are only valid for 24 hours.
